title: League of Legends Anime PLEASE!
body: So I used LVOC (Rito plz don't ban me if that is a bannable offense) and I played {{champion:99}}  (her Korean voice is so kawaii) and everytime I hear her voice, I just really get more desperate for a League of Legends Anime. It would be so cool and good! They could be clever in how to set up the storyline, but I'm sure I would enjoy it either way. So I wanted to set up this poll so we can try to get Riot to write an anime series for League. Please vote, this could potentially happen!

replies.body: I think there is a show based off of League called La La Demacia, you might want to give it a look.

I LOVE anime (No I don't go to conventions) and I think this would be a great idea! La La Demacia is a thing but I don't really like it so I think this is a great idea.
